author: julie_reid
post: I for 1 have only cared about the origins of JESUS. Simply because, most religions do. The image of Christ, is displayed prominently. I have no degree. I simply ask, could the shroud of Turin possibly just be that of an other unfortunate soul.. The date of the cloth seems to be the what everyone wants to know. Was not JESUS for Nazareth crucified young? Those stains look like an old man..
title: What did Jesus lookÂ like?
